fields.name: Pinging Staff
fields.value:
Do not ping staff members unless you need their help.  For example, if someone is spamming the server, feel free to ping <@&457281742844330004>.  If you just have a question or need something else simple, ping an online staff member; not the entire <@&457281742844330004> role.
​

fields.name: Users Role
fields.value:
In order to join roles with colors, upload files/images, embed links, use bot commands, use external emojis, and post reactions, you must have the `Users` role.  In order to obtain this role, go to <#174317464337776640> and type `sudo request users`.
** **
If you haven't gotten any warning points after 48 hours, the Users role will be given automatically.
​

fields.name: Now join a channel and get chatting!
fields.value:
To join a distro role, head over to <#174317464337776640> and use `sudo listdistro` to list the available distro roles and `sudo joindistro <distro>` to join that role.  You can join as many roles as you like.
** **
To get a colored role, use `sudo favdistro <distro>` to join your favorite distro's role.​

fields.name: Changelog for #rules
fields.value:
Check out [the Github page](https://github.com/discordlinux/rules/commits/master) to see what changes have been made to <#172522057291005953>
​
